body_html:
@scucheri Make sure you have the paths correct. /Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle should contain ndk-build, and /Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk should contain tools/android.

It seems to somehow be getting confused and splitting -MNC out of one of the sdk/.../android-MNC/ dirs rather than the appropriate API level. Do you have the indicated APIs installed? You can check via sdk/tools/android.

It seems to somehow be getting confused and splitting -MNC out of one of the sdk/.../android-MNC/ dirs rather than the appropriate API level. Do you have the indicated APIs installed? You can check via sdk/tools/android.
body:
@scucheri Make sure you have the paths correct. /Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle should contain ndk-build, and /Users/scucheri/Library/Android/sdk should contain tools/android.

It seems to somehow be getting confused and splitting -MNC out of one of the sdk/.../android-MNC/ dirs rather than the appropriate API level. Do you have the indicated APIs installed? You can check via sdk/tools/android.
